Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small CommutativeDimonoid AllSmallCommutativeDimonoid is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic CommutativeDimonoid of orders 2 to 6.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallCommutativeDimonoid">
The output commutativedimonoid are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small CommutativeDimonoid
"IsASmallCommutativeDimonoid" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic CommutativeDimonoid of orders 2 to 6. It returns true if the model is a Small CommutativeDimonoid, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallCommutativeDimonoid">
